name.ch: 全球化都市與社會空間

goal.ch:
Students should develop a deeper understanding of how cities work and interact
with the community. How rivalries and hierarchies between cities work and what
factors are considered for developing a successful urban economy. Global
Network Theory, the function of tolerance (R. Florida) and modern ITTechnologies
(M. Castells) are key theories that contribute to this understanding
goal.en:
